definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: The geothermal resource is rich in Liaocheng of Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 山东省聊城市地热资源丰富。

sentences.english: The foreground of geothermal resources and the advantageous region for exploration were provided.
sentences.chinese: 指出兰州坳陷地热资源的前景和勘查有利地段。

sentences.english: The main geothermal energy resource of Anyang City is the underground hot water.
sentences.chinese: 安阳市地热资源主要为地下热水。

sentences.english: Within numerous oil and gas fields all over China, there is a large quantity of geothermal resource in total.
sentences.chinese: 中国石油矿权区面积广，区内地热资源总量大。

sentences.english: Taohuashan area in Zaoyuan of Zhangqiu city is rich in geothermal resources.
sentences.chinese: 章丘市枣园桃花山地区蕴藏着丰富的地热资源。

sentences.english: Thermal infrared remote sensing technique is one of the approaches to the geothermal resource survey.
sentences.chinese: 热红外遥感技术是地热资源调查的有效途径之一。

sentences.english: Conghua is the township of the world-famous hot spring, the geothermal resources is very abundant.
sentences.chinese: 从化是世界闻名的温泉之乡，地热资源非常丰富。

sentences.english: Geothermal resources are clean and recyclable.
sentences.chinese: 地热资源是本土绿色可再生能源。

sentences.english: Many geothermal sources are too deep to be tapped economically.
sentences.chinese: 许多地热资源埋藏的太深，很难经济的开采。
这蕴藏着丰富的地热资源。

definition: Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang
remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
